document_data.name: Weaponers of Cormyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Weaponers of Cormyr''' was a simple arms shop in [[Tilverton]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Weaponers of Cormyr neighbored a rowdy tavern called [[The Curse]], and stood not far from the [[Windlord's Rest]] inn.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, Weaponers of Cormyr was in business dealing in simple weapons. The shopkeep proudly announced that the store carried the finest [[steel]] from Cormyr: [[axe]]s, [[sword]]s, [[bardiche]]s, [[bec de corbin]]s, [[guisarme]]s, [[fauchard]]s, [[voulge]]s, [[lucerne hammer]]s, [[bo stick]]s, [[jo stick]]s, [[javelin]]s, and others.
